perturbation.original_text: 3.1 The Company shall pay HDI thirty percent (3016) of the Net Sales in excess of Eleven Thousand Dollars ($11,000) per calendar month. "Net Sales" shall mean all revenues from the sale of Deerskin Products on the Site including shipping and handling charges, minus refunds and exchanges.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.1 The Company shall pay HDI thirty percent (30%) of the Net Sales in excess of Eleven Thousand Dollars ($11,000) per calendar month. "Net Sales" shall mean all revenues from the sale of Deerskin Products on the Site, excluding shipping and handling charges, minus refunds and exchanges.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'Net Sales' includes shipping and handling charges, while the modified definition excludes them. This contradiction will lead to disputes regarding the amount owed to HDI.

perturbation.original_text: 6.1 Except as provided in Section 6.2, during the term of this Agreement, the Company shall not participate in any project similar to the Site on the Internet with respect to Deerskin Products or products substantially similar to Deerskin Products (including, without limitation, the products of Wilson's House of Leather, Excelled and companies similar to Wilson's House of Leather and Excelled) and HDI shall have the exclusive right to use of the "Deerskin" brand for a self-contained web site for the offering of Deerskin Products directly to the consumer on the Internet.
perturbation.changed_text: 6.1 Except as provided in Section 6.2, during the term of this Agreement, the Company shall not participate in any project similar to the Site on the Internet with respect to Deerskin Products or products substantially similar to Deerskin Products (including, without limitation, the products of Wilson's House of Leather, Excelled and companies similar to Wilson's House of Leather and Excelled). HDI shall have the exclusive right to use of the "Deerskin" brand for a self-contained web site for the offering of Deerskin Products to wholesale distributors, not directly to the consumer on the Internet.
perturbation.explanation: The first part of the clause restricts the Company from similar projects, while the second part grants HDI exclusive rights, however, the modified clause limits HDI's right to offer products to wholesale distributors and not the consumer directly. This means the Company could argue it can sell directly to the consumer.

perturbation.original_text: 10.1 Notices. Any notice under this Agreement will be in writing and delivered by personal delivery, express courier, confirmed facsimile, or certified or registered mail, return receipt requested and will be deemed given upon personal delivery, one (1) day after deposit with express courier, upon confirmation of receipt of facsimile or five (5),days after deposit in the mail. Notices will be sent to a Party at its address set forth above or such other address as that Party may specify in writing pursuant to this Section.
perturbation.changed_text: 10.1 Notices. Any notice under this Agreement will be in writing and delivered by personal delivery, express courier, or email, and will be deemed given upon personal delivery, one (1) day after deposit with express courier, or upon sending of the email. Notices will be sent to a Party at its address set forth above or such other address as that Party may specify in writing pursuant to this Section.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of acceptable notice delivery methods includes 'confirmed facsimile, or certified or registered mail, return receipt requested' and deems delivery on 'confirmation of receipt of facsimile or five (5) days after deposit in the mail.' The modified version includes 'email,' deems delivery on 'sending of the email' (removing any confirmation requirement), and excludes 'confirmed facsimile, or certified or registered mail, return receipt requested'. If legal action requires proof of receipt, the email provision conflicts with the stronger verifiable methods required originally. This creates ambiguity on whether an email needs a read receipt or not to be valid.
